column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The broth for the ramen was great--flavorful but not too heavy or overpowering. The assari was a simpler broth
column2: but we loved the extra punch in the black. Noodles were perfectly chewy
column3: and the egg was perfectly soft boiled and flavorful. However
column6: lacked flavor. The meat and egg were both cold in the bowl.
